Game.Name: Final Bubble Bobble (Japan)
Game.plot: Welcome to the world of Bubble Bobble!Those funny critters, Bubblen and Bobblen are finally making an appearance in the Sega Master system.Play this game and see the wild adventures of Bubblen and Bobblen.Cheat: Level SelectTo choose your starting level enter the following code:Cheat: Level SelectAt the main menu, press Pause and the border will change to blue. Now, enter any of the following codes:Cheat: Level SelectEnter the select menu after the title screen, press the Pause button, the frame will turn from green to blue, then do :Cheat: Password for All Items and All LevelsTo get all the levels, all of player 1's special items and most of player 2's use this password: 9ENVI555Cheat: Password for All Items and All LevelsEnter the following password to access the final level:Cheat: Unlock The EndingsThe game has 3 endings, depending on the following:
